title: Watery Desktop 3D Live Wallpaper and Screensaver
text:
Never miss all the cool giveaways: get notifications in your browser! 
Click here to get notifications about new giveaways in your browser. Don't miss all the cool giveaways. Allow notifications in your browser. 
Every day we offer FREE licensed software you’d have to buy otherwise. $14.95 Giveaway of the day — Watery Desktop 3D Live Wallpaper and Screensaver Watery Desktop 3D will animate your wallpaper with water effects. User rating: 2 (67%) 1 (33%) Leave a comment 
Watery Desktop 3D Live Wallpaper and Screensaver is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. 
Watery Desktop 3D will animate your wallpaper with water effects, such as waves and rain. It will also work as a screensaver which floods your screen, you'll see how everything on your desktop will sink into water.   7 SP1 with Platform Update (KB2670838) Publisher:
